statements: SELECT * FROM WaterConservation;
SELECT project_name, water_saved FROM WaterConservation WHERE water_saved > 1000;
SELECT project_location, start_date, end_date FROM WaterConservation WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_location FROM WaterConservation ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, water_saved FROM WaterConservation ORDER BY water_saved DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_location, water_saved FROM WaterConservation WHERE project_location='California' ORDER BY water_saved DESC
SELECT * FROM WaterConservation WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM WaterConservation WHERE water_saved > 10000 ORDER BY project_name ASC
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM WaterConservation WHERE water_saved BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM WaterConservation
SELECT * FROM WaterConservationEfforts WHERE project_location = 'California';
SELECT project_name, water_saved_gallons FROM WaterConservationEfforts WHERE water_saved_gallons > 1000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_location FROM WaterConservationEfforts ORDER BY project_location ASC;
SELECT project_name, project_id FROM WaterConservationEfforts WHERE project_location = 'New York' ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM GreenTechnologyProjects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_location, water_saved_gallons FROM WaterConservationEfforts WHERE water_saved_gallons >= 10000;
SELECT * FROM WaterConservationEfforts WHERE project_location = 'California';
SELECT project_name, project_location, SUM(water_saved_gallons) AS total_water_saved FROM WaterConservationEfforts GROUP BY project_name, project_location ORDER BY total_water_saved DESC;
SELECT project_id, technology_name, project_description FROM GreenTechnologyProjects WHERE technology_type = 'Solar' ORDER BY project_id DESC;

SELECT project_name, technology_name, project_location FROM WaterConservationEfforts JOIN GreenTechnologyProjects ON WaterConservationEfforts.project_id = GreenTechnologyProjects.project_id WHERE WaterConservationEfforts.water_saved_gallons > 5000 ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterConservationProjects;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM WaterConservationProjects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_type, water_saved FROM WaterConservationProjects WHERE project_type = 'Irrigation';
SELECT organization_name, contact_person, email FROM Organizations ORDER BY organization_name ASC;
SELECT participant_name, role, project_name FROM ProjectParticipants JOIN WaterConservationProjects ON ProjectParticipants.project_id = WaterConservationProjects.project_id;
SELECT * FROM WaterConservationProjects WHERE water_saved > 1000 ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_location, water_saved FROM WaterConservationProjects WHERE project_type IS NOT NULL;

SELECT project_name, project_description FROM WaterConservationProjects JOIN Organizations ON WaterConservationProjects.project_id = Organizations.organization_id WHERE Organizations.email LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT Organizations.organization_name, COUNT(ProjectParticipants.participant_id) AS total_participants FROM Organizations INNER JOIN ProjectParticipants ON Organizations.organization_id = ProjectParticipants.organization_id GROUP BY Organizations.organization_name;

SELECT project_name, project_location, project_type FROM WaterConservationProjects WHERE project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM ProjectParticipants WHERE organization_id = 1) ORDER BY project_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterConservationProjects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, total_water_saved FROM WaterConservationProjects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM WaterConservationProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, state, country FROM ProjectLocations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT participant_name, role, contact_email FROM ProjectParticipants WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, total_water_saved FROM WaterConservationProjects ORDER BY project_name ASC, start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM ProjectLocations WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND state = 'California'
SELECT project_name, participant_name, role FROM WaterConservationProjects INNER JOIN ProjectParticipants ON WaterConservationProjects.project_id = ProjectParticipants.project_id

SELECT project_name, SUM(water_usage) AS total_water_usage FROM WaterUsageData INNER JOIN WaterConservationProjects ON WaterUsageData.project_id = WaterConservationProjects.project_id GROUP BY project_name

SELECT project_name, location_name, city, state, country FROM WaterConservationProjects LEFT JOIN ProjectLocations ON WaterConservationProjects.project_id = ProjectLocations.project_id ORDER BY project_name DESC
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM water_conservation_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM water_conservation_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM project_members ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT member_name, email FROM project_members WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM water_conservation_projects WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM water_conservation_projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%water%';
SELECT member_name, role, email FROM project_members WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT source_id, source_type, source_capacity FROM water_sources ORDER BY source_capacity DESC;
